languages.text: "Боюсь, мне не подходит ваше предложение, Вольный Торговец. Придется решать вопрос по старинке".
"I'm afraid I must reject your offer, Rogue Trader. I'll have to deal with this the old-fashioned way."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, мне не подходит ваше предложение, Вольный Торговец. Придется решать вопрос по старинке".

traits.locale_text: "I'm afraid I must reject your offer, Rogue Trader. I'll have to deal with this the old-fashioned way."
"I'm afraid I must reject your offer, Rogue Trader. I'll have to deal with this the old-fashioned way."
"I'm afraid I must reject your offer, Rogue Trader. I'll have to deal with this the old-fashioned way."
"I'm afraid I must reject your offer, Rogue Trader. I'll have to deal with this the old-fashioned way."

languages.text: “恐怕我必须拒绝您的提议了，行商浪人。看来，我得用老办法解决问题了。”
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid I must reject your offer, Rogue Trader. I'll have to deal with this the old-fashioned way."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕我必须拒绝您的提议了，行商浪人。看来，我得用老办法解决问题了。”

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, ich muss Euer Angebot ablehnen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich muss das auf die altmodische Weise regeln."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid I must reject your offer, Rogue Trader. I'll have to deal with this the old-fashioned way."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, ich muss Euer Angebot ablehnen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich muss das auf die altmodische Weise regeln."

languages.text: « J'ai peur de devoir refuser votre offre, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. J'imagine que je n'ai pas d'autre choix que de faire ça à l'ancienne. »
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid I must reject your offer, Rogue Trader. I'll have to deal with this the old-fashioned way."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai peur de devoir refuser votre offre, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. J'imagine que je n'ai pas d'autre choix que de faire ça à l'ancienne. »

languages.text: «Me temo que debo rechazar su oferta, Comerciante Independiente. Tendremos que resolver esto a la antigua usanza».
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid I must reject your offer, Rogue Trader. I'll have to deal with this the old-fashioned way."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que debo rechazar su oferta, Comerciante Independiente. Tendremos que resolver esto a la antigua usanza».

languages.text: 「あなたの提案は断ることになります、自由開拓者。この件は古臭い方法で解決するしかありません」
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid I must reject your offer, Rogue Trader. I'll have to deal with this the old-fashioned way."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの提案は断ることになります、自由開拓者。この件は古臭い方法で解決するしかありません」

languages.text: "Korkarım teklifini reddedeceğim Hür Tacir. Bu meseleyi eski usullerle çözmem şart."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid I must reject your offer, Rogue Trader. I'll have to deal with this the old-fashioned way."

traits.locale_text: "Korkarım teklifini reddedeceğim Hür Tacir. Bu meseleyi eski usullerle çözmem şart."
